Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/c:@M@Fi.name: contents
Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/c:@M@Fi.abstract: The contents payload as an array of dictionaries, where each dictionary represents an entry in the cloud.

Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/c:@M@Fi.name: nextToken
Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/c:@M@Fi.abstract: A next token used for pagination purposes. Optional.

Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/c:@M@Fi.name: authRedirectURL
Classes/FolderListResponse.html#/c:@M@Fi.abstract: A redirect URL to a cloud provider’s OAuth page. Typically this is only required internally.

Classes/Filestack.html#/c:@M@Filestack@o.name: resumeCloudRequestNotification
Classes/Filestack.html#/c:@M@Filestack@o.abstract: This notification should be posted after an app receives an URL after authentication against a cloud provider.

Classes/Filestack.html#/c:@M@Filestack@o.name: apiKey
Classes/Filestack.html#/c:@M@Filestack@o.abstract: An API key obtained from the Developer Portal.

Classes/Filestack.html#/s:9FilestackAAC6.name: upload(from:storeOptions:useIntelligentIngestionIfAvailable:queue:uploadProgress:completionHandler:)
Classes/Filestack.html#/s:9FilestackAAC6.abstract: Uploads a file directly to a given storage location.

Classes/Filestack.html#/s:9FilestackAAC2.name: uploadFromImagePicker(viewController:sourceType:storeOptions:useIntelligentIngestionIfAvailable:queue:uploadProgress:completionHandler:)
Classes/Filestack.html#/s:9FilestackAAC2.abstract: Uploads a file to a given storage location picked interactively from the camera or the photo library.

Classes/Filestack.html#/c:@M@Filestack@o.name: folderList(provider:path:pageToken:appURLScheme:completionHandler:)
Classes/Filestack.html#/c:@M@Filestack@o.abstract: Lists the content of a cloud provider at a given path. Results are paginated (see pageToken below.)

Classes/Filestack.html#/s:9FilestackAAC5.name: store(provider:path:storeOptions:completionHandler:)
Classes/Filestack.html#/s:9FilestackAAC5.abstract: Stores a file from a given cloud provider and path at the desired store location.

Classes/StoreResponse.html#/c:@M@Filesta.name: contents
Classes/StoreResponse.html#/c:@M@Filesta.abstract: The contents payload as a dictionary containing details about the operation response.

Classes/StoreResponse.html#/c:@M@Filesta.name: authRedirectURL
Classes/StoreResponse.html#/c:@M@Filesta.abstract: A redirect URL to a cloud provider’s OAuth page. Typically this is only required internally.

Classes/StoreResponse.html.name: StoreResponse
Classes/StoreResponse.html.abstract: This class represents a response obtained from a cloud store request.

Classes/Filestack.html.name: Filestack
Classes/Filestack.html.abstract: The Filestack class provides an unified API to upload files and manage cloud contents using Filestack REST APIs.

Classes/FolderListResponse.html.name: FolderListResponse
Classes/FolderListResponse.html.abstract: This class represents a response obtained from a cloud folder list request.
